citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The exercise yard is overgrown with weeds. The overgrown weeds makes it difficult to see the fence line (to be sure it will
contain dogs) and would be difficult to clean it with the overgrown weeds and also could allow areas for pests to live in.
Weeds must be controlled/trimmed to allow regular cleaning and husbandry practices and to protect the health and well-
being of the animals.
***Correct by August 4, 2025.

It has been more than 12 months since the facility has had the attending veterinarian conduct the head to tail physical
exams for each adult dog. An annual physical exam for each dog is required and helps ensure that each dog is healthy.
Ensure to contact the attending veterinarian to get the annual physical exams completed.
***Correct by August 25, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.11(c) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The exercise yard is overgrown with weeds. The overgrown weeds makes it difficult to see the fence line (to be sure it will 
contain dogs) and would be difficult to clean it with the overgrown weeds and also could allow areas for pests to live in. 
Weeds must be controlled/trimmed to allow regular cleaning and husbandry practices and to protect the health and well-
being of the animals. 
***Correct by August 4, 2025. 
3.13(a)(2) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
It has been more than 12 months since the facility has had the attending veterinarian conduct the head to tail physical 
exams for each adult dog. An annual physical exam for each dog is required and helps ensure that each dog is healthy. 
Ensure to contact the attending veterinarian to get the annual physical exams completed.  
***Correct by August 25, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
